---
title: "In-class Exercise 3"
author: "kai feng"
date: "Sep 2, 2024"
date-modified: "last-modified"
execute:
  eval: true
  echo: true
  freeze: true
---


# Installing R-Packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, sf, ggstatsplot, tmap, spatstat, raster)
```
:::


# Installing Maptools

eval: false = avoid maptools being download and install repetitively every time the Quarto document been rendered.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages("maptools",
                 repos="https://packagemanager.posit.co/cran/2023-10-13")
```
:::


# Importing Geospatial Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_sf <- st_read(dsn = "data/MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundaryWebSHP",                 
               layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `C:\Users\ngkng\Desktop\School\Geo -Local\In-class_Ex\In-class_Ex03\data\MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundaryWebSHP' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
childcare_sf <- st_read("data/child-care-services-geojson.geojson") %>% 
  st_transform(crs=3414)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `child-care-services-geojson' from data source 
  `C:\Users\ngkng\Desktop\School\Geo -Local\In-class_Ex\In-class_Ex03\data\child-care-services-geojson.geojson' 
  using driver `GeoJSON'
Simple feature collection with 1545 features and 2 fields
Geometry type: POINT
Dimension:     XYZ
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6824 ymin: 1.248403 xmax: 103.9897 ymax: 1.462134
z_range:       zmin: 0 zmax: 0
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::


# Creating coastal outline

**st_union() to derive the coastal outline sf tibble data.frame**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sg_sf <- mpsz_sf %>% 
  st_union()

plot(sg_sf)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Creating ppp objects from sf data.frame


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
childcare_ppp <- as.ppp(childcare_sf)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in as.ppp.sf(childcare_sf): only first attribute column is used for
marks
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(childcare_ppp)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in default.charmap(ntypes, chars): Too many types to display every type
as a different character
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Only 10 out of 1545 symbols are shown in the symbol map
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(childcare_ppp)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Marked planar point pattern:  1545 points
Average intensity 1.91145e-06 points per square unit

Coordinates are given to 11 decimal places

marks are of type 'character'
Summary:
   Length     Class      Mode 
     1545 character character 

Window: rectangle = [11203.01, 45404.24] x [25667.6, 49300.88] units
                    (34200 x 23630 units)
Window area = 808287000 square units
```


:::
:::


# Creating ***owin*** object from sf data.frame


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sg_owin <- as.owin(sg_sf)
plot(sg_owin)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(sg_owin)
```

:::
:::


# Combining point events object and owin object


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
childcareSG_ppp = childcare_ppp[sg_owin]
plot(childcareSG_ppp)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in default.charmap(ntypes, chars): Too many types to display every type
as a different character
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Only 10 out of 1545 symbols are shown in the symbol map
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Kernel Density Estimation of Spatial Point Event

re-scale the unit of measurement to km before performing KDE


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
childcareSG_ppp.km <- rescale.ppp(childcareSG_ppp, 
                                  1000, 
                                  "km")

kde_childcareSG_adaptive <- adaptive.density(
  childcareSG_ppp.km, 
  method="kernel")
plot(kde_childcareSG_adaptive)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### convert KDE output into grid object

maptools method


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
par(bg = '#E4D5C9')

gridded_kde_childcareSG_ad <- maptools::as.SpatialGridDataFrame.im(
  kde_childcareSG_adaptive)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Please note that 'maptools' will be retired during October 2023,
plan transition at your earliest convenience (see
https://r-spatial.org/r/2023/05/15/evolution4.html and earlier blogs
for guidance);some functionality will be moved to 'sp'.
 Checking rgeos availability: FALSE
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
spplot(gridded_kde_childcareSG_ad)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


spatstat.geom method


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gridded_kde_childcareSG_ad <- as(
  kde_childcareSG_adaptive,
  "SpatialGridDataFrame")
spplot(gridded_kde_childcareSG_ad)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Extracting study area using sf objects


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pg_owin <- mpsz_sf %>%
  filter(PLN_AREA_N == "PUNGGOL") %>%
  as.owin()

childcare_pg = childcare_ppp[pg_owin]

plot(childcare_pg)  
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in default.charmap(ntypes, chars): Too many types to display every type
as a different character
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Only 10 out of 61 symbols are shown in the symbol map
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
